name: SERAM: Security Reasoning Framework
short_description:
SEARM provides support for the definition of access control policies, such as ACLs and RBAC models.

Additionally, it allows to specify inference policies and comprises techniques for reasoning about inferences and information distribution along a set of inference rules.

SERAM builds upon the Java libraries:
- JAGAL: http://sourceforge.net/p/jagal
- TOVAL: http://sourceforge.net/p/toval
- JAWL: http://sourceforge.net/p/jawl
- SEPIA: http://sourceforge.net/sepiaframework

To use SERAM, make sure all required libraries are on the build path.
summary: Framework for security-related definition and reasoning.
